title: 1.8的死亡不掉落怎么打开
author: 英雄帅比
txt_content: RT,请问Minecraft1.8的死亡不掉落怎么打开？

replies.txt_content: gamerule k........ ture 如果不会输k。。。。。的话，按Tab键可以帮你补完指令

很简单啊，先按T
再打/gamerule doKeepInventory true
【建议复制粘贴】

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule keepInventory true
